lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court affirmed a lower court’s finding that Garden City, N.Y., had discriminated against minorities with a move to favor single-family homes over modestly priced apartments.

headline.main: Ruling That Long Island Village Engaged in Biased Zoning Is Upheld

snippet: A federal appeals court affirmed a lower court’s finding that Garden City, N.Y., had discriminated against minorities with a move to favor single-family homes over modestly priced apartments.
